text: Sakka Podu Podu Raja is a 1978 Indian Tamil-language film directed by S. P. Muthuraman, starring Jaishankar, Jayachitra in the lead roles. Kamal Haasan and Fatafat Jayalaxmi played guest roles. The film was hit at the box office. == Cast == *Jaishankar *Jayachitra *Kamal Haasan - Special appearance *Phataphat Jayalaxmi - Special appearance *Manorama *Cho Ramaswamy *Major Sundarrajan *S. A. Ashokan *Srikanth *Thengai Srinivasan *K. A. Thangavelu *Venniradai Moorthy *Suruli Rajan *Shanmugasundari == Soundtrack == == Reception == ==References== ==External links== * Category:Indian films Category:1978 films Category:Films directed by S. title: Sakka Podu Podu Raja
